text: Bilten was a municipality in the canton of Glarus in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011 the municipalities of Bilten, Filzbach, Mollis, Mühlehorn, Näfels, Niederurnen, Oberurnen and Obstalden joined together to become the new municipality of Glarus Nord. ==Other websites== *Official website of Bilten * Category:Former municipalities of Glarus Category:2011 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Bilten
